Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (57.58%) toLactoferricin BK: 15%, R: 18%. residues 1-15 LfcinB M10Y + residues 4-21 of thanatin.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC25923 (IC50 16 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa ATCC27853 (IC50 32 ug/ml), E. coli O78 (IC50 32 ug/ml), S. pullorum CCVC533 (IC50 32 ug/ml), E. aerogenes HC2124 (IC50 16 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae HC2187 (IC50 32 ug/ml), and C. albicans HC3150 (IC50 64 ug/ml).Toxicity: human RBC: not hemo.lytic at 256 ug/ml.Recombinant production:bacteria:Escherichia coli: successfully expressed and purified, released by enterokinase, yield: 0.5 mg/liter.Entry history:The original entry has been replaced due to the same sequence as AP0286. Replaced 5/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Feng X, Liu C, Guo J, Song X, Li J, Xu W, Li Z.2012
Literature Information.Title: ecombinant expression, purification, and antimicrobial activity of a novel hybrid antimicrobial peptide LFT33.
